name: CastleGuard - Episode 3
detailed_description:
Road To The Castle

The CastleGuard suite is finally available !

t's time to continue what you started. We must repel the enemy !

HISTORY

In this mission you have to cross the big canyon which gives access to the castle, eliminate the guards and infiltrate the castle !
Pay attention to new game mechanics and AI !

short_description: CastleGuard is a independent FPS game. The objective if you accept it is to pass cities and country sides full of enemies ready to kill you at any moments. If you die, you restart. Good luck soldier !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4370 3.8GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 3,1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8300 3.7GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1300x 3,5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 280X (3GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
